title: Body Movement
comment: Lead movements with your own body first rather than limbs or partner

title: Redirect
comment: Absorb and redirect momentum to maintain energy in the dance. Avoid jarring changes.

title: Pulling In Tension
comment: Pull in with the body, arms maintain previous tension (probably nothing)

title: Pull In Stretch
comment: Free arm back, to generate stretch across body

title: Hitting Breaks
comment: To hit a break, firm up frame

title: Swing Out to 6-or-8
comment: From a swing out, continue linearly for a 6-beat move, circularly for an 8-beat move

title: Syncopated triple step
comment: Syncopate triple step to the music

title: Swing Out 5
comment: Relax / breathe out to reduce tension & frame

title: Prep a Jump
comment: Push into the floor on the previous count

title: Don't Stop
comment: The music is always moving, don't force a restart on #1

title: Dancers
comment: Dancers who happen to lead & follow NOT leaders & followers who dance
